main event: A UFO was observed on 8 August 1961, believed to be a satellite, visible for 3 minutes before disappearing into clouds.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at a location specified as 129 08'E in the far east., The object was observed at an elevation of 30 degrees., The sighting lasted for a total of 3 minutes., The object was identified by its superior brilliance., It disappeared behind low clouds at a position angle of 20 degrees.
sighted object: UFO believed to be a satellite
